Spondylocostal dysostosis has often been grouped with a similar condition called spondylothoracic dysostosis, and both are called Jarcho-Levin syndrome; however, they are now considered distinct conditions.",GHR,spondylocostal dysostosis
How many people are affected by spondylocostal dysostosis ?,"Spondylocostal dysostosis is a rare condition, although its exact prevalence is unknown.",G
